original_title: Complete Pole: Tricks and Trick Combos
overview: Complete Pole introduces the new Pole Tricks and Trick Combos Beginner - Advanced Mary Kolacinski DVD. She reveals her secrets to completing combinations of tricks that allow you to be creative and innovative with your routines. The tricks and combos she teaches are a great training tool to help you progress to the next stage. Included are detailed explanations of required skills, points of contact, weight transfer & timing so you can execute these tricks safely and effectively.  DVDs features:  Reveals secrets to completing combinations of tricks that allow you to be creative and innovative with your routines.  The tricks and combos she teaches are a great training tool to help you progress to the next stage.  Included are detailed explanations of required skills, points of contact, weight transfer & timing so you can execute these tricks safely and effectively.
tagline: Raising the vertical Bar for Pole Instruction
title: Complete Pole: Tricks and Trick Combos
